# List of presidents of the Legislative Chamber of the Great Khural of Tuva

This is a list of presidents (Speakers) of the Legislative Chamber of the Great Khural of Tuva from 2002:
{|class="wikitable"
!Name
!Entered office
!Left office
|-
|Vasily Oyun
|June 2002
|May 27, 2009
|-
|Vitaly Valkov
|May 27, 2009
|November 6, 2009
|-
|Boris Balch-ool
|November 6, 2009
|March 9, 2010
|-
|Vitaly Valkov
|March 9, 2010
|October 21, 2010
|}

*[http://067whp.narod.ru/twva.htm]
